## ExtendedTNode type

[TNode](./static-tree.tnode.md) extended with children as properties

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ExtendedTNode<ChildrenRecord extends Record<string, ExtendedTNode> = {}, Data extends TNodeData = {}> = TNode<Data> & ChildrenRecord;
```
